verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, if thou shalt hearken diligently <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> thee on high <S%H5945><s%> above all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>:

and all these blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon thee <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake thee <S%H8085><s%>, if thou shalt hearken unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy beasts <S%H929><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the young <S%H6251><s%> of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy kneading-trough <S%H4863><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest in <S%H935><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be when thou goest out <S%H3318><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>: they shall come out <S%H3318><s%> against thee one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and shall flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon thee in thy barns <S%H618><s%>, and in all that thou puttest <S%H4916><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H1288><s%>; and he will bless thee in the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will establish <S%H6965><s%> thee for a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself <S%H7650><s%>, as he hath sworn unto thee <S%H8104><s%>; if thou shalt keep the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that thou art called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall be afraid of thee <S%H3372><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give thee <S%H5414><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will open <S%H6605><s%> unto thee his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure <S%H214><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%> in its season <S%H6256><s%>, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: and thou shalt lend <S%H3867><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and thou shalt not borrow <S%H3867><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H5414><s%> thee the head <S%H7218><s%>, and not the tail <S%H2180><s%>; and thou shalt be above only <S%H4605><s%>, and thou shalt not be beneath <S%H4295><s%>; if thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do them <S%H6213><s%>,

and shalt not turn aside <S%H5493><s%> from any of the words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, or to the left <S%H8040><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve them <S%H5647><s%>.

But it shall come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, that all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon thee <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake thee.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy kneading-trough <S%H4863><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy cattle <S%H504><s%>, and the young <S%H6251><s%> of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest in <S%H935><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be when thou goest out <S%H3318><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> upon thee cursing <S%H3994><s%>, discomfiture <S%H4103><s%>, and rebuke <S%H4045><s%>, in all that thou puttest <S%H4916><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> unto to do <S%H6213><s%>, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>, and until thou perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%>; because <S%H6440><s%> of the evil <S%H7455><s%> of thy doings <S%H4611><s%>, whereby thou hast forsaken me <S%H5800><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto thee <S%H3615><s%>, until he have consumed thee from off the land <S%H127><s%>, whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> in to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with consumption <S%H7829><s%>, and with fever <S%H6920><s%>, and with inflammation <S%H1816><s%>, and with fiery heat <S%H2746><s%>, and with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and with blasting <S%H7711><s%>, and with mildew <S%H3420><s%>; and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee until thou perish <S%H6><s%>.
And thy heaven <S%H8064><s%> that is over thy head <S%H7218><s%> shall be brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> that is under thee shall be iron <S%H1270><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust <S%H6083><s%>: from heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall it come down <S%H3381><s%> upon thee <S%H8045><s%>, until thou be destroyed.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%>; thou shalt go out <S%H3318><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against them <S%H5127><s%>, and shalt flee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H2189><s%>: and thou shalt be tossed to and from among all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And thy dead body <S%H5038><s%> shall be food <S%H3978><s%> unto all birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and unto the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; and there shall be none to frighten them away <S%H2729><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with the boil <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and with the emerods <S%H2914><s%>, and with the scurvy <S%H1618><s%>, and with the itch <S%H2775><s%>, whereof thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not be healed <S%H7495><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with madness <S%H7697><s%>, and with blindness <S%H5788><s%>, and with astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>;

and thou shalt grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>, as the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropeth <S%H4959><s%> in darkness <S%H653><s%>, and thou shalt not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in thy ways <S%H1870><s%>: and thou shalt be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and robbed <S%H1497><s%> alway <S%H3117><s%>, and there shall be none to save thee <S%H3467><s%>.

Thou shalt betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with her <S%H1129><s%>: thou shalt build a house <S%H1004><s%>, and thou shalt not dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H5193><s%>: thou shalt plant a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and shalt not use the fruit thereof <S%H2490><s%>.

Thine ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H2543><s%>: thine ass shall be violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> from before thy face <S%H6440><s%>, and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to thee <S%H6629><s%>: thy sheep shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and thou shalt have none to save thee <S%H3467><s%>.

Thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>; and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%>, and fail <S%H3616><s%> with longing for them all the day <S%H3117><s%>: and there shall be nought in the power <S%H410><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, and all thy labors <S%H3018><s%>, shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not eat up <S%H398><s%>; and thou shalt be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> alway <S%H3117><s%>;
so that thou shalt be mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> which thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee in the knees <S%H1290><s%>, and in the legs <S%H7785><s%>, with a sore <S%H7451><s%> boil <S%H7822><s%>, whereof thou canst not <S%H3201><s%> be healed <S%H7495><s%>, from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of thy foot <S%H7272><s%> unto the crown of thy head <S%H6936><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H3212><s%> thee <S%H4428><s%>, and thy king whom thou shalt set <S%H6965><s%> over thee <S%H1471><s%>, unto a nation that thou hast not known <S%H3045><s%>, thou nor thy fathers <S%H1><s%>; and there shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>.

And thou shalt become an astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and a byword <S%H8148><s%>, among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> whither Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall lead thee away <S%H5090><s%>.

Thou shalt carry <S%H3318><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>, and shalt gather <S%H622><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> in <S%H622><s%>; for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume it <S%H2628><s%>.

Thou shalt plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and dress <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H8354><s%>, but thou shalt neither drink of the wine <S%H3196><s%>, nor gather <S%H103><s%> the grapes <S%H8438><s%>; for the worm shall eat them <S%H398><s%>.

Thou shalt have olive-trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout all thy borders <S%H1366><s%>, but thou shalt not anoint <S%H5480><s%> thyself with the oil <S%H8081><s%>; for thine olive <S%H2132><s%> shall cast its fruit <S%H5394><s%>.
Thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but they shall not be thine <S%H3212><s%>; for they shall go into captivity <S%H7628><s%>.
All thy trees <S%H6086><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> possess <S%H3423><s%>.

The sojourner <S%H1616><s%> that is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee shall mount up <S%H5927><s%> above thee higher <S%H4605><s%> and higher <S%H4605><s%>; and thou shalt come down <S%H3381><s%> lower <S%H4295><s%> and lower <S%H4295><s%>.
He shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to thee <S%H3867><s%>, and thou shalt not lend to him <S%H7218><s%>: he shall be the head, and thou shalt be the tail <S%H2180><s%>.

And all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon thee <S%H7291><s%>, and shall pursue thee <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake thee <S%H8045><s%>, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst <S%H8085><s%> not unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which he commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>:
and they shall be upon thee for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder <S%H4159><s%>, and upon thy seed <S%H2233><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Because thou servedst <S%H5647><s%> not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness <S%H8057><s%>, and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>, by reason of the abundance of all things <S%H7230><s%>;

therefore shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against thee <S%H7458><s%>, in hunger, and in thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and in nakedness <S%H5903><s%>, and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all things <S%H5414><s%>: and he shall put a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon thy neck <S%H6677><s%>, until he have destroyed thee <S%H8045><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against thee from far <S%H7350><s%>, from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flieth <S%H1675><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose tongue <S%H3956><s%> thou shalt not understand <S%H8085><s%>;

a nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%>, that shall not regard <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the old <S%H2205><s%>, nor show favor <S%H2603><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%>,

and shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>; that also shall not leave <S%H7604><s%> thee grain <S%H1715><s%>, new wine <S%H8492><s%>, or oil <S%H3323><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy cattle <S%H504><s%>, or the young <S%H6251><s%> of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, until they have caused thee to perish <S%H6><s%>.

And they shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, until thy high <S%H1364><s%> and fortified <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%>, wherein <S%H2004><s%> thou trustedst <S%H982><s%>, throughout all thy land <S%H776><s%>; and they shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%> throughout all thy land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given thee <S%H5414><s%>.

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thine own body <S%H990><s%>, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and of thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H4692><s%>, in the siege and in the distress <S%H4689><s%> wherewith thine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress thee <S%H6693><s%>.

The man <S%H376><s%> that is tender <S%H7390><s%> among you <S%H3966><s%>, and very delicate <S%H6028><s%>, his eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward his brother <S%H251><s%>, and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom he hath remaining <S%H3498><s%>;

so that he will not give <S%H5414><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom he shall eat <S%H398><s%>, because he hath nothing left <S%H7604><s%> him <S%H4692><s%>, in the siege and in the distress <S%H4689><s%> wherewith thine enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

The tender <S%H7390><s%> and delicate <S%H6028><s%> woman among you <S%H5254><s%>, who would not adventure to set <S%H3322><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%> for delicateness <S%H6026><s%> and tenderness <S%H7391><s%>, her eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward the husband <S%H376><s%> of her bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward her son <S%H1121><s%>, and toward her daughter <S%H1323><s%>,

and toward her young one <S%H7988><s%> that cometh out <S%H3318><s%> from between her feet <S%H7272><s%>, and toward her children <S%H1121><s%> whom she shall bear <S%H3205><s%>; for she shall eat <S%H398><s%> them for want <S%H2640><s%> of all things secretly <S%H5643><s%>, in the siege <S%H4692><s%> and in the distress <S%H6693><s%> wherewith thine enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> thee in thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

If thou wilt not observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>, that thou mayest fear <S%H3372><s%> this glorious <S%H3513><s%> and fearful <S%H3372><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> THY GOD <S%H430><s%>;

then Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H6381><s%> thy plagues <S%H4347><s%> wonderful <S%H6381><s%>, and the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, even great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>, and sore <S%H7451><s%> sicknesses <S%H2483><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>.

And he will bring <S%H7725><s%> upon thee again all the diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which thou wast afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H6440><s%>; and they shall cleave unto thee <S%H1692><s%>.

Also every sickness <S%H2483><s%>, and every plague <S%H4347><s%>, which is not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>, them will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> upon thee <S%H8045><s%>, until thou be destroyed.

And ye shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> in number <S%H4962><s%>, whereas <S%H834><s%> ye were as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>; because thou didst not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.
